mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO cle_case_attachments ( cle_case_attachments.doc_url, cle_case_attachments.`case_id`, cle_case_attachments.`upload_phrase_code`, cle_case_attachments.`upload_phrase_title`, cle_case_attachments.`crt_time`, cle_case_attachments.`crt_user_id`, cle_case_attachments.is_deleted, cle_case_attachments.`crt_user_name`) VALUES
( #{item.docUrl}, #{item.caseId}, #{item.uploadPhraseCode}, #{item.uploadPhraseTitle}, #{item.crtTime}, #{item.crtUserId}, #{item.isDeleted}, #{item.crtUserName} )
